Summary: we were playing in the alley ,there were 7 spheres of light in the evening easwtern sky ,suddenly i had to look up and a silverybluish ufo about 35 -45 ft. in dia.
divs: Sighting Detailswe were playing in the alley ,there were 7 spheres of light in the evening easwtern sky ,suddenly i had to look up and a silverybluish ufo about 35 -45 ft. in dia. with no lights or sound was a little higher than the telephone pole.we all ran frightened into a strang persons house. IT WAS ROUND WITH A SMALLER CIRCLE WITH A "Y" shaped center. P.s I have anothert witness and will submit to a lie dector or any kind of test.I BELIEVE.THEN I READ IN THE BIBLE OF WHAT EZIEKEIL SAW,THE WHEEL IN A WHEEL . BERYLE COLOR PERFECT DESCRIPTION
